abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} with a savage double claw, you may add +2. If you do (decide before rolling), inflict +1 harm on a strong hit and count a weak hit as a miss.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +edge using your claws to disarm or intimidate your opponent, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage}+iron by climbing a treacherous surface or clinging in a precarious position using your claws to gain purchase, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
